info.name: Language
info.author: Team Kiru
info.description: Get Kiru in a more local language!

help.not_how_to_use: That's not the right way to use {command}!
help.author: Author

info.name: Help
info.author: Team Kiru
info.description: Gives you some help, when you need it, of course!

settings.no_command_description: These settings are unique for your server!
settings.prefix_content: Use this subcommand to change my prefix. use 'revert' to use the original one.
settings.onjoin_content: Want Kiru to welcome new members into the server? Or give a new role? This is the place!
settings.onleave_content: Want Kiru to make a comment when people leave? Use this!
settings.cant_change_settings: I can't let you modify my settings here. Maybe in your server!

command.greetingFromLead: Hi! This is the Lead Developer of Kiru!
command.leadSpeaking:
We've been working hard to bring you this new bot.
Hopefully, you'll enjoy it just as much as we love it!
command.versionText:
Discord.js v. 11.4.2
Node.js     v.{version}
Kiru! We have our own repo.
Debian or Ubuntu. (I can't remember.)
command.specialThanksUnder:
You, of course!
Thanks for using {bot.name}.
May the most adorable
bot be the only one!

info.name: Ping
info.author: Kio
info.description: Ping! Get a rough estimate of the message delivery. Pong.
